line: Let me fight with you. Better odds with two.

speaker: Cipher
line: Hey, remember what the seamstress said? You know what really matters.

speaker: Phainon
line: Yeah...

speaker: Phainon
line: ...I'll leave it to you then.

speaker: Cipher
line: Wow, someone's not shy. Just so you know, I'm not in the business of making losing deals...

speaker: Cipher
line: I'll distract that executioner — you go turn the world's biggest lie into truth. Let me become the first wind of your new world.

speaker: Mydei
line: Just shut up and get out of here!

speaker: Phainon
line: Are you crazy, Mydei!? Immortal or not, even if you're the demigod of Strife...

speaker: Mydei
line: ...I'm still no match for them?

speaker: Phainon
line: No, I know you can... I just wanted to request that you witness the Era Nova with me.

speaker: Phainon
line: Together, let's prove... that we're enough to transcend the prophesized fate.

speaker: Mydei
line: Ha! Could it be, that now, at the critical juncture, our mighty "Deliverer" is chickening out? Scared of a stupid prophecy?

speaker: Mydei
line: I'll transcend the prophesized fate, alright, but I've got a better way: As the son of Gorgo, I'll prove myself with one last grand victory, just like when I ripped out the old king's heart!

speaker: Mydei
line: Go, leave this to me. If the black tide creatures block out the sun, then we Kremnoans will fight in the shade—

speaker: Mydei
line: And when I'm done with that executioner, we'll raise our cups where the west winds end.

speaker: Little Ica
line: Doot... Doot-Doot.

speaker: Phainon
line: Hey, little one... are you scared?

speaker: Little Ica
line: Doot! Doot-Doot!

speaker: Phainon
line: Hehe... as brave as Hyacine. Stay close, Little Ika [ sic ]...

speaker: Little Ica
line: Doot, doot-doot.

speaker: Phainon
line: What? No, not... not you too...

speaker: Little Ica
line: Doot-Doot, doot.

speaker: Phainon
line: ...I see. I won't squander your kindness... your hopes.

speaker: Phainon
line: So, please keep this bit of sky standing for me—

speaker: Little Ica
line: Doot! Doot-Doot!

speaker: Phainon
line: Well, now there's one last thing I need to do before the Era Nova...

speaker: Phainon
line: Come, executioner. Let this patch of clear sky show me where to strike.

speaker: Aglaea
line: "All shall bid farewell to one, and that person alone will witness the miracle. Such is the will of fate."

speaker: Phainon
line: So, even the future revealed by the Titan may not come to pass.

speaker: Aglaea
line: The Era Nova... this unrivaled masterpiece, I have no regrets, now that I may entrust it to my most trusted apprentice.

speaker: Phainon
line: Are you saying...

speaker: Aglaea
line: Fate is ever unassailable. The golden threads tell me the black tide rushes toward the Vortex, ready to swallow this place. I must weave the last of my humanity into a net to hold back the deluge...

speaker: Aglaea
line: "I shall have my final bath in warm and radiant gold." — Now, the hour of fulfillment has come.

speaker: Aglaea
line: Forgive me. I must snip away every risk, to weave the strongest future for the new world.

speaker: Aglaea
line: There is nothing more to say. We part here. I shall personally dispatch that wretched executioner — not with threads of gold, but with the steel tip of a needle.

speaker: Phainon
line: Tribbie, look... we made it to the Vortex.

speaker: Phainon
line: That prophesized future, the flower fields where the west wind ends, Era Nova... we're so close now...

speaker: Phainon
line: You... can't speak anymore?

speaker: Phainon
line: Please... allow me to pause just a moment before I keep my promise—

speaker: Phainon
line: Let me answer your cruel fate by tearing that executioner's heart from the void.

speaker: Anaxa
line: The Vortex of Genesis... The last time I was here, I was returning the Coreflame of "Reason."

speaker: Anaxa
line: I didn't have the time to observe it in too much detail back then — but a "holy sanctuary" of the Titans? Looks more like their frozen crypt to me.

speaker: Phainon
line: Well, all the Coreflames do lie here now...

speaker: Phainon
line: It's my honor to walk the final stretch with a mind such as yours, Professor.

speaker: Anaxa
line: Oho, getting ahead of ourselves, are we?

speaker: Anaxa
line: Have you forgotten so quickly? I died for truth long ago. What walks with you now is but a thought in your mind.

speaker: Phainon
line: Of course... how could I forget that?

speaker: Anaxa
line: But I'll say the same to you: it's my honor to walk this final stretch with you, too.

speaker: Anaxa
line: Now go. Stand tall and finish your final task—

speaker: Phainon
line: Yeah, just leave it to me...

speaker: Anaxa & Phainon
line: Time for that wretched executioner... to pay what they owe.

speaker: Lygus
line: Hehe, you really think you're prepared? Allow me to give you a warning most earnest: Once you see what these memories hide...

speaker: Lygus
line: The world's course... will be forever irreversible.

children.speaker: Lygus
children.line: Very well. As you have made up your mind, let us bear witness together.

children.speaker: Lygus
children.line: As the sole audience of this eternal theater, I have been rapturously awaiting your arrival. And this too is the very reason I must show you everything.

children.speaker: Lygus
children.line: I believe that, since you've bathed in that Aeon's gaze —

children.speaker: Lygus
children.line: You can make Amphoreus's frozen fate flow once again...

children.speaker: Lygus
children.line: Very well, I'll be here. Waiting.

speaker: Lygus
line: Feeling a bit lost? As you now see, this scene marks the final act of the drama "Amphoreus"...

speaker: Lygus
line: The final Eternal Recurrence created by this man's hand, and the last one this world shall undergo.

speaker: Lygus
line: Behold. At the swordsman's side stands one he has sometimes called companion, other times comrade, that Nameless Hero absent from the annals of history —

speaker: Lygus
line: ▶ ( He / She ) is the swordsman's ideal in his youth, the "Deliverer" that guided him resolutely onward through fantasy — And now, in the name of the "Nameless," ( he / she ) has become an essential and inseparable part of the epic of Amphoreus.

speaker: Lygus
line: ▶ And this time, under ( his / her ) guidance, what choice shall the hero make? Whither shall the fate of the world flow? And what is the ultimate truth of the nature of Amphoreus...?

speaker: Lygus
line: There are many mysteries yet to be unwound. But, if I may, allow me to temporarily yield the stage to one far more fitting. Please, put your hands together and give a rousing round of applause for they who will reveal the answers, and bring about the final end of the 33550336th Flame-Chase Journey—

speaker: Lygus
line: The master of the countless memories we saw, the other important actor now stepping into the Vortex, they who have already burnt their own self to cinder — the Flame Reaver!

children.speaker: Phainon
children.line: So, in the end, you succeeded...

children.speaker: Phainon
children.line: ...Executioner.

children.speaker: Phainon and Flame Reaver
children.line: With my flesh as kindling...

children.speaker: Phainon and Flame Reaver
children.line: Light the first dawn of the new world.
